name: nativescript-jailbreak-detector
description: This plugin checks for root in android devices as well as for jailbreak in IOS devices

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --emlator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build &&  cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-jailbreak-detector && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
